unit.utterance: bìng fēng bìng fēnfù shìbīng yánshǒu jūnjì
unit.utterance_translation: And (she) told the soldiers to closely observe discipline.

unit.utterance: zé è zuìhòu ne jiù shì è jiāyùguān de bǎixìng è huānxǐ yíngjiē hànjūn jìnchéng
unit.utterance_translation: In the end, the civilians of Jiayuguan happily welcomed the Han army, (they) went in the city.

unit.utterance: zài zhè cì ne mùlán tā de shǒubì shàng yě shì zhōng le jiànshāng
unit.utterance_translation: At this time, Mulan had gotten injured on her shoulder.

unit.utterance: g suǒyǐ shuō zài yíng zhōng xiūrǎng xiūyǎng
unit.utterance_translation: So to say, (she) cured (her shoulder) in the camp.

unit.utterance: zài yuánshuài lái tànwàng tā de shíhòu ne
unit.utterance_translation: When the marshal came to visit her,

unit.utterance: tā (xiǎng) běn xiǎng bǎ yuánshuài bǎ zìjǐ de nǚér xǔpèi gěi huāmùlán
unit.utterance_translation: The marshal wants to give his daugther to Huamulan [to marry].

unit.utterance: dànshì mù mùlán dàjiā doū zhīdào yīnwéi shì gè nǚháizǐ
unit.utterance_translation: But Mulan, everybody knows, because (she) is a girl,

unit.utterance: tā shì méi yǒu bànfǎ ā qǔ qīn de
unit.utterance_translation: she has no way of marrying a woman.

unit.utterance: suǒyǐ shuō tā jiù tuīcí shuō zìjǐ de jiànshāng fāzuò
unit.utterance_translation: so to say, she declined, (she) said her injury had got worse.

unit.utterance: qǐngqiú fǎn xiāng shěng qīn
unit.utterance_translation: (She) requested (she) may return to the village and province, and relatives.

unit.utterance: zhè shíhòu jī gè jiānglǐng lái kàn lái tànwàng
unit.utterance_translation: At this time, some high ranking military officers came to visit (her).

unit.utterance: doū xiànmù tā jiāng yào chéng qīn
unit.utterance_translation: (They) all envied (her), she will become (the marshal's) relative.

unit.utterance: dàn tā jiǎzhuāng zìjǐ jiā zhōng yǐjīng yǒu qīzǐ le
unit.utterance_translation: But she pretended (she) already had a wife in her own home.

unit.utterance: ā dàn zhè gè shíhòu zhāotíng xuānzhào láojūn
unit.utterance_translation: But at this moment, the dynasty granted an audience to its subjects, (it) rewarded the soldiers of the army.

unit.utterance: g bān gěi huángjīn haiyǒu yùbó ā
unit.utterance_translation: (It) conferred gold and jade (to the soldiers).

unit.utterance: dàjiā doū xiàng mùlán qìnghè
unit.utterance_translation: Everybody congratulated Mulan.

unit.utterance: dànshì huāmùlán tā bù bù xiǎngyào nà gè shēngguān shòushǎng
unit.utterance_translation: But Huamulan, she does not want that promotion and price.

unit.utterance: tā juéxīn ne huídào zìjǐ de jiāxiāng hé zìjǐ de jiārén
unit.utterance_translation: She had decided, (she) will go back to her own home village and her own family.

unit.utterance: nénggòu gòngdù zìjǐ de gòngdù zìjǐ de yúshēng
unit.utterance_translation: (She) will be able to spend her own remaining life together (with them).

unit.utterance: è tā zài gěi bǎ zhè xiē xiǎngfǎ shuō shuō gěi yuánshuài zhīhòu
unit.utterance_translation: After she had told her plans to the marshal,

unit.utterance: yuánshuài jiù zhī nénggòu miǎnqiáng yǔnxǔ
unit.utterance_translation: the marshal could only reluctuantly allow (it).

unit.utterance: zài mùlán mùlán huí xiāng zhīhòu ne
unit.utterance_translation: After Mulan had returned home,

unit.utterance: bǎixìng yántú zhāodài
unit.utterance_translation: the civilians along the sides of the road welcomed (her).

unit.utterance: jiā zhōng fùmǔ jiě dì doū fēn fēn chūlái xiāngyíng
unit.utterance_translation: The parents and siblings in her family all came out one by one, (they) welcomed (her).

unit.utterance: yīnwéi bìjìng shì yī gè zài zhōngguó hěn zhòngyào de zhè zhǒng tuányuán de shíkè
unit.utterance_translation: because after all (this) is a moment that was a very important reunion in China.

unit.utterance: ā dàjiā doū fēicháng de gāoxīng g
unit.utterance_translation: Everybody was very happy.

unit.utterance: yī tiān ne yuánshuài è dào huāmùlán de jiā
unit.utterance_translation: One day, the marshal came to Huamulan's home.

unit.utterance: (zhǔnbèi) wéi nǚér tíqīn
unit.utterance_translation: (He) proposed (to Mulan) for (his) daughter.

unit.utterance: zé ā huā fù ne kěnéng jiù shì tuī shuō érzǐ shòu fēnghán rǎnbìng zài chuáng
unit.utterance_translation: Father Hua was maybe forced to say (his) son was suffering from the winter wind and an infectious disease, (he) was in bed.

unit.utterance: yuánshuài qù chuáng qián tànbìng
unit.utterance_translation: The marshal went to the bed, (he) visited the sick person.

unit.utterance: è huā lǎoshì méi méi yǒu bànfǎ zài tuīcí le
unit.utterance_translation: Teacher Hua had no way of declining again.

unit.utterance: zhī dé bǎ mùlán jiào jiào lái
unit.utterance_translation: (He) called Mulan.

unit.utterance: zhīhòu zǒu shàng táng lái
unit.utterance_translation: Then, (she) walked in the room.

unit.utterance: hè yuánshuài réng réng shuō xiǎngyào qù jiàn nà gè huā jiāngjūn
unit.utterance_translation: Marshal He said, (I) want to meet military officer Hua.

unit.utterance: lǎorén ne yě jiù shì shuō gàosù tā zhè gè jiù shì huāmùlán
unit.utterance_translation: The old man, (he) said, (he) told him this is Huamulan.

unit.utterance: zhè gè shíhòu g hè yuánshuài cái huǎngrán dàwù
unit.utterance_translation: At this moment, Marshal He suddenly comprehended.

unit.utterance: yuánlái mùlán shì nà gè nán bàn nǚ zhuāng
unit.utterance_translation: Originally, Mulan is a woman dressed as a man.

unit.utterance: huā lǎo ne ānpái le jiǔyàn
unit.utterance_translation: Old Hua, (he) arranged a feast.

unit.utterance: xiànghè yuánshuài qǐngzuì mùlán è nǚ bàn nán zhuāng zhī shì ne
unit.utterance_translation: (He) begged Marshal He for forgiveness because of the thing that (Mulan) is a woman dressed as a man, and that (she) pretended.

unit.utterance: jiǔyàn guò hòu mùlán jiāng he yuánshuài qǐng dào jīfáng shuō
unit.utterance_translation: After the feast had passed, Mulan invited Marshal He to the equipment room.

unit.utterance: yǐqián guójiā yǒu nán
unit.utterance_translation: Some time ago, the country had hardships,

unit.utterance: wǒ cái dài fù cóng jūn wéi guó xiàolì bù qiú mínglì
unit.utterance_translation: only [because of this] I replaced (my) father to enlist in the army for the country's benefit. (I) did not want fame.

unit.utterance: rú jīnguó nèi ānjìng
unit.utterance_translation: Today the country is peaceful.

unit.utterance: wǒ yuàn réng jiùqín yú fǎngzhī
unit.utterance_translation: I agree to [go back to] be diligent and spin and weave.

unit.utterance: jìn wǒ fùnǚ běnfēn
unit.utterance_translation: (I) will give priority to my duty as a woman.

unit.utterance: hè yuánshuài tīng le ne yě shífēn qīnpèi
unit.utterance_translation: Marshal He listened (to her), (he) admired (her) very much.

unit.utterance: biàn huí zhāo jiāozhǐ qù le
unit.utterance_translation: Thus (he) returned to the dynasty, (he) handed over (Hua Mulan's) decree, (he) went.

unit.utterance: nà cóng zhè gè gùshì ne wǒmén jiù nénggòu kàndào
unit.utterance_translation: Well, from this story, we can see

unit.utterance: ké ā qíshí duìyú mùlán lái shuō
unit.utterance_translation: Actually, speaking of Mulan,

unit.utterance: tā tā jiù shì zé yī gè zhōngguó gǔdài nǚzǐ

unit.utterance: zhēngqiáng hǎo shèng
unit.utterance_translation: (She was competitive), (she) wanted to win.

unit.utterance: tāmén tāmén běnshēn xiǎngyào hé nánháizǐ yīyàng
unit.utterance_translation: They wanted to be like boys.

unit.utterance: de zé tāmén běnshēn jiù tèbié xiǎng hé nánháizǐ yīyàng

unit.utterance: nénggòu yǒu (tū) dàjiā píngděng de quánlì
